sourcing.instructions: B: Chemical supply stores or online suppliers; Er: Rare earth material suppliers; Fe: Metal suppliers or hardware stores; Tb: Rare earth material suppliers.
steps: B: Chemical supply stores or online suppliers; Er: Rare earth material suppliers; Fe: Metal suppliers or hardware stores; Tb: Rare earth material suppliers.

1. Measure 36.4 g of B, 18.2 g of Er, 145.6 g of Fe, and 4.5 g of Tb using an analytical balance. 2. Combine all materials in a clean, dry mixing container. 3. Use a mortar and pestle to finely grind the mixture to ensure uniformity. 4. Transfer the ground mixture into a ceramic crucible.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure 36.4 g of B, 18.2 g of Er, 145.6 g of Fe, and 4.5 g of Tb using an analytical balance. 2. Combine all materials in a clean, dry mixing container. 3. Use a mortar and pestle to finely grind the mixture to ensure uniformity. 4. Transfer the ground mixture into a ceramic crucible.

steps: 1. Preheat a furnace to 1000°C. 2. Place the crucible in the furnace and heat for 2 hours to ensure complete reaction and consolidation of materials.
heating.raw_text: 1. Preheat a furnace to 1000°C. 2. Place the crucible in the furnace and heat for 2 hours to ensure complete reaction and consolidation of materials.

steps: 1. Turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down naturally to room temperature. 2. Do not open the furnace door until it reaches ambient conditions (approximately 2-3 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. Turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down naturally to room temperature. 2. Do not open the furnace door until it reaches ambient conditions (approximately 2-3 hours).

steps: 1. Once cooled, remove the solid sample from the crucible. 2. Sand the edges and surfaces to achieve a smooth finish. 3. Optionally, apply a protective sealant to enhance durability and prevent oxidation.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, remove the solid sample from the crucible. 2. Sand the edges and surfaces to achieve a smooth finish. 3. Optionally, apply a protective sealant to enhance durability and prevent oxidation.
